greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: In binary expansion of n, reduce contiguous blocks of 0's to 0.
link: Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
program: (PARI) a(n)=my(v=binary(n),t); for(i=1,#v, if(v[i], t+=t+1, t%2, t+=t)); t \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 17 2016
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 20 2003
